title: Our Lady of Charity Novena
description: Our Lady of Charity, known also as La V√≠rgen de la Caridad del Cobre, is a title and image of Our Lady in Cuba. Pray this novena for Cuba, Cuban peoples, salt and copper miners.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

O Holy Virgin, Our Lady of Charity, with happiness and humility I come to your feet! Virgin of Miracles, you cure the sick, give hope where there is despair, give strength to the afflicted, preserve from disgrace our families, protect the youth, and guard our children. No one can explain all the miracles and fortitude you give to the souls that come to you. We, your children, thank you for all your graces. (mention request here‚Ä¶) Amen.

Memorare Remember, O most gracious Virgin Mary, that never was it known that anyone who fled to thy protection, implored thy help, or sought thy intercession was left unaided. Inspired with this confidence, I fly to thee, O Virgin of virgins, my Mother. To thee do I come, before thee I stand, sinful and sorrowful. O Mother of the Word Incarnate, despise not my petitions, but in thy mercy hear and answer me. Amen. Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be Our Lady of Charity, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
